BlackMonkey

    LEVEL_03

    YANTRA

    Connect the world through smart devices

    Build smart connected devices that communicate with each other. Learn how everyday objects become intelligent through sensors, microcontrollers, and internet connectivity. Create your own IoT ecosystem.

    Yantra opens the door to the Internet of Things. Learn how to connect everyday objects to the internet, creating smart devices that communicate and respond. Build sensor networks, integrate cloud services, and develop mobile apps to control your IoT creations. Transform your ideas into connected reality.

    Age Group

    12-14 years

    Duration

    12 weeks

    Category

    Internet of Things

    What You'll Learn

    ESP32/NodeMCU programming

    Sensor networks (temperature, humidity, motion)

    Cloud connectivity (ThingSpeak, Blynk)

    Mobile app integration

    Smart home automation projects

    Data visualization and analysis

    Learning Outcomes

    Understand IoT architecture

    Program microcontrollers

    Work with APIs and cloud services

    Build real-world connected solutions

    Ready to Connect the World?

    Build smart connected devices with Yantra. Create your own IoT ecosystem and bring everyday objects to life with internet connectivity.
